head.supplied: 21/6/80. ¶ ¶ I have investigated your ¶ Schoenus ¶ carefully, dear Mr Tepper, as far as the material allowed it, and I think that it is different from my West Australian ¶ Schoenus trachycarpus ¶ ...

div.p: RB MSS M198, Library, Royal Botanic Gardens Melbourne.
MS annotation by Tepper: 'Reply 17.7.80'. Letter not found. 21/6/80.

Ich habe Ihren Schoenus sorgfältig untersucht, lieber Herr Tepper, soweit das Material es erlaubte, und glaube, dass selbiger von meinem West-Australischen Schoenus trachycarpus verschieden sei. Ich habe diese Art daher als S. Tepperi beschrieben, u wird die Diagnose in der neuen Nummer der Fragmenta erscheinen. Lassen Sie mich bitten, dass gute blühende Exemplare herbeigeschafft werden im Frühling, um die Staubgefässe zu beschreiben; alle Ihre Exemplare waren im Herbst abgeblütht u nur mit verwitterten Früchten versehen.
R Brown fand Schoenus deformis am Memory Cove, diesen werden Sie gewiss noch in Ihrer Nähe finden.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; line-height: 0.1945in; font-size: 10pt; text-align: end;

div.p:
I have investigated your Schoenus carefully, dear Mr Tepper, as far as the material allowed it, and I think that it is different from my West Australian Schoenus trachycarpus . Therefore I have described this species as S. tepperi and the diagnosis will appear in the new number of the Fragmenta.
Described in B80.08.03, p. 106. Let me ask that good flowering specimens be collected in spring to describe the stamens; all your specimens had finished flowering in autumn and had only weathered fruits.

R. Brown found Schoenus deformis at Memory Cove,
Robert Brown (1773-1858) was at Memory Cove, SA, in February 1802 (R. Brown (2001), pp.140-3). you will certainly still find this in your vicinity.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; line-height: 0.1945in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;
font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; line-height: 0.1945in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;
